TitleEnglish: The Daily Life of the Immortal King
SummaryEnglish: As a cultivation genius who has achieved a new realm every two years since he was a year old, Wang Ling is a near-invincible existence with prowess far beyond his control. But now that he’s sixteen, he faces his greatest battle yet – Senior High School. With one challenge after another popping up, his plans for a low-key high school life seem further and further away.
Aliases: The Daily Life of the Immortal King (2020)
Daily Life of the Immortal King

1.SummaryEnglish: This is aired after the 15th episode and is a redo of the 10th when Wang Ling goes back in time to make a change of the outcome of the battle.

1.TitleEnglish: Wang Ling's Triple Kill of Tuntian-ha
1.SummaryEnglish: Ten years ago, the Demon King Swallowing Toad landed in Songhai City. Ten years later, Wang Ling was promoted to the 60th door, and unexpectedly met Tun Tianha here. Wang Ling wanted to enter the ordinary class to control his spiritual power, but Tun Tianha deliberately pretended to be dead, so Wang Ling entered the key class.

2.TitleEnglish: A Fair and Just Class President Election
2.SummaryEnglish: Sun Rong and Chen Chao will be in the class for the class leader election. Sun Rong contracted the entire commissary store and solicited tickets for new students. Who can get the job of class president?

3.TitleEnglish: How to Make an Origin Fostering Pill
3.SummaryEnglish: The class was in the alchemy class. During the process of alchemy, Chen Chao's alchemy furnace was accidentally blown up. What should I do to repair the alchemy furnace?

4.TitleEnglish: What Should I Do When the Goddess Forces Me on a Date
4.SummaryEnglish: In order to thank Wang Ling, Sun Rong stopped at the door of Wang Ling's house, hoping to go to the amusement park with Wang Ling. Unexpectedly, Yingliu's people secretly dispatched to assassinate Sun Rong, but Wang Ling beat them back one by one.

5.TitleEnglish: The Three Brothers of Shadow Stream
5.SummaryEnglish: Door 60 received the "Shadow Killing Order" from the shadow stream and began the intense defense work. Three master assassins came to "siege". The 60 gates were heavily guarded, and the Assassin master broke through the defense line and infiltrated the 60 gates.

6.TitleEnglish: B++ is the Best Language in the World
6.SummaryEnglish: After Wang Ling experienced the incident of the three brothers, he was "sick and rested" at home, so Sun Rong, Chen Chao, and Guo Hao came to Wang Ling's house together and wanted to take a psionic test with Wang Ling.

7.TitleEnglish: 18 Tips for Maintaining a Spiritual Sword
7.SummaryEnglish: The elite class five-member group was selected to represent 60 schools to participate in the Spirit Sword Conference, and the teachers gave guidance to the students. At the same time, the opponent's 59 doors are also just around the corner.

8.SummaryEnglish: Wang Ling dug out the peach wood spirit sword from his childhood and found that he actually had a sword spirit...

9.SummaryEnglish: 60 people came to the 59-door arena, and the two were tit for tat. At the same time, Jiang Liuying, the master of Ying Liu Sect, also quietly sneaked into 59 Sect, wanting to assassinate Sun Rong secretly.

10.SummaryEnglish: The old driver of Yingliu kidnapped Wang Ling and He Bufeng, should everyone be rescued as much as possible?

11.SummaryEnglish: The spirit sword competition officially started, and the students from both sides entered into a fierce battle. The 59th and 60th gates both showed their full strength and planned to compete in the competition.

12.TitleEnglish: A Dog is a Man's Best Friend
12.SummaryEnglish: The battle was at a stalemate, and the appearance of Erha seemed to solve the problem of Wang Ling's psychic overflow. Wang Ling was finally able to show off his skills. Who will win this battle?

13.SummaryEnglish: The Sun family and the Tang family have always had a feud, and this time, Sun Rong and Tang Jingze are undoubtedly part of the settlement of the feud between the two families. In 60, the ultimate comeback was at this time, and it was about to win.

14.SummaryEnglish: Wang Ling had already forgotten about winning and losing, and the little things he had with his companions loosened Wang Ling's tense heart. At this moment, an accident happened.

15.SummaryEnglish: Sun Rong was already devastated, and Wang Ling did everything he could, but he couldn't restore the fact that Sun Rong was already devastated. Wang Ling decided to use his powerful spiritual power to reverse the time and save Sun Rong.

1.TitleEnglish: Wang Ling Wants To Lead A Quiet Life
1.SummaryEnglish: After nearly depleting the planet's spiritual energy by going back in time, Wang Ling dreams of only one thing: to be left alone. Unfortunately, fate seems to have other plans for him.

2.TitleEnglish: A Home Visit By The Demon Master
2.SummaryEnglish: Sent to Earth to annihilate the human race and conquer the planet, Chienpaud is far from having achieved his goals. His master decides to come and ask him to account.

3.SummaryEnglish: Ten years ago, the famous assassin nicknamed "Vagabond Charmer" disappeared without a trace. Some rumors claim that he is hiding near the 60th school of Songhai…

4.TitleEnglish: How To Forge A Spiritual Sword
4.SummaryEnglish: After taking a class on spirit swords at school, Wang Ling and his friends decide to go and have their respective weapons serviced.

5.TitleEnglish: The Four Bizarre Tales of Faction 60
5.SummaryEnglish: Four great legends circulate in the 60th school. Is there any truth behind the rumors?

6.TitleEnglish: The Internet Is Not A Lawless Paradise
6.SummaryEnglish: Seduced by a streamer, Chen Chao becomes a little too obsessive. His worried friends try to get him back in touch with reality.

7.TitleEnglish: The Foolish Old Man's Spirit in the Sun Family
7.SummaryEnglish: The wealthy Sun family is going through a difficult phase. Fortunately, they are not the type to give up.

8.TitleEnglish: A Sword Dance of the Five Elements
8.SummaryEnglish: Several students from the 60th school decide to enter the Songhai Artistic Fencing Competition to prove that spiritual swords are more than weapons.

9.TitleEnglish: A Train to the Twinkling Stars
9.SummaryEnglish: After the contest misadventure, the whole planet fell madly in love with Sun Rong. If he doesn't quickly find a way to ward off the spell, things will end badly.

10.TitleEnglish: Extra: The Director Is Not Home Today
10.SummaryEnglish: The Elite class of the 60th school of Songhai visits an animation studio and discovers the harsh reality of jobs in the sector.

11.SummaryEnglish: The Demon Emperor seems to have realized that Wang Ling poses a considerable threat, while Richman is still determined to destroy Earth. The apocalypse is closer than ever.

12.TitleEnglish: The Observer Beyond Time And Space
12.SummaryEnglish: The survival of all mankind is threatened by the invasion of demons. Will Wang Ling stand up to an empire that has already conquered countless planets?

1.SummaryEnglish: After repelling the demonic invasion, Wang Ling hopes to finally be able to lead a peaceful life. Unfortunately for him, the arrival of a new student will upset his daily life.

2.SummaryEnglish:
After the destruction of the demon world, the demons were displaced in the human world. The Jiugong family sent their eldest daughter, Jiugong Ryoko, to study at the "Sixty Gates" of the Huaxiu Kingdom to secretly collect demons and send them back to Sun Island.
Wang Ling and other people in and Jiugong Ryoko get along, gradually found her and the whole Jiugong family's true purpose ...... against the sky of the immortal king, and this time to secretly why the battle?

3.SummaryEnglish: Wang Ling and his friends set out to pick premium immortal herbs. They will quickly realize that they are not alone in the mountains.

4.SummaryEnglish: Guo Hao's new familiar leaves no one indifferent. Stella is perpetually surrounded by a crowd of admirers, among which have crept individuals thirsty for unicorn blood.

5.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious swordswoman is stirring up trouble in Songhai by systematically challenging every sword-wielder she finds. At the same time, Jingke enters a rebellious phase and refuses to obey Wang Ling.

6.SummaryEnglish: The main clans of Songhai are gathered for the sale of the year, where they will have to fight to acquire priceless treasures. Meanwhile, Wang Ling is faced with concerns of an entirely different order.

7.TitleEnglish: Welcome To Join The Exorcist Team!
7.SummaryEnglish: The Exorcists seem to have invaded Songhai City. Guo Hao takes a dim view of their presence, unlike Chen Chao who is not insensitive to the charisma of these newcomers.

8.SummaryEnglish: For ten years, Zhuo Yi has been the undisputed hero of Songhai City. Unfortunately for him, his imposture is about to come to light.

9.SummaryEnglish: Wang Ling and his friends prepare to attend the Saints' Gala, an annual party held at the Sun family's Celestial Paradise. Wang Ling is going to have to prove himself if he is to be considered worthy of staying by Sun Rong's side.

10.TitleEnglish: The Sun Family's Sacred Cudgel Is Lost (Mission Accomplished Version)
10.SummaryEnglish: In order to rise in her father's esteem, Yoshiko Kyûmiya is determined to steal the Sun Family's sacred staff. To achieve this, she will have to find a partner and infiltrate the Saints' Day gala.

11.SummaryEnglish: With the help of Lord Thunder, Wang Ling and Sun Rong investigate the theft of the sacred staff. They are about to uncover the dark plot that threatens Eternia.

12.SummaryEnglish: After many years spent in the human world, Chienpaud's identity is murky. Now that Zhuo Yi has unraveled the secret of the Kyumiya Volcano, the time has come for the former demonic king to choose sides.

1.SummaryEnglish: Wang Ling and his comrades first hear of the legendary swordsman Fanrui, who can master the Celestial Style. Under the guidance of Mr. Wang, the students of the 60th school will learn new ways of wielding the sword.

2.SummaryEnglish: Sun Rong fainted after falling victim to Wang Ling's flash of amnesia. Her grandfather is worried about her and sends her for a battery of medical exams.

3.SummaryEnglish: Fanrui, the immortal swordsman, decided that Wang Ling would make an ideal successor. Unfortunately for him, Wang Ling has no intention of showing him his abilities.

4.SummaryEnglish: The earth's crust is dotted with veins that supply the atmosphere with spiritual energy. What would happen if one of these veins was seriously damaged? Wang Ling and his friends are about to have the answer...

5.TitleEnglish: Wang Ling's Art of Great Luck
5.SummaryEnglish: Wang Ling decides to make a gift for Zhuo Yi. He goes shopping with his friends, who turn out to be easy prey for unscrupulous sellers. Will Wang Ling manage to save them from debt?

6.SummaryEnglish: Wang Ling agreed to participate in the 60th school charity sale. To obtain items to sell, he will once again turn to the Ways.

7.SummaryEnglish: After the failures of White Tiger and Azure Dragon, the 60th school will have to deal with the third of the Four Animals. Will the explosive Vermilion Bird be more skilled than his brothers in arms?

8.SummaryEnglish: Black Turtle, the last member of the Four Animals, is determined to avenge his brothers. He is preparing to use an ancestral technique to attack the 60th school, whose students are preparing for the worst.

9.SummaryEnglish: The Four Animals were actually more than four! The fifth member of this dangerous school decides to attack Sun Rong to avenge his classmates.

10.SummaryEnglish: After borrowing a fraction of Wang Ling's strength, Sun Rong is now able to face Ocher Dragon. Will she manage to leave the spiritual dimension of which she is prisoner?

11.SummaryEnglish: Taking advantage of a moment of inattention from the guardians, Chen Nanxuan finally managed to awaken to a Way. When he discovers that his disciples have been decimated in his absence, he decides to do everything possible to take revenge.

12.SummaryEnglish: Yi Jianchuan finally faces Chen Nanxuan, more powerful than ever after awakening to a Way. Wang Ling's friends are convinced that they are attending an immersive theatrical performance, far from suspecting that the stakes of the fight are very real.
